data.title: LE SSERAFIM, 'Gold Certification' from RIAJ
data.meta_description: LE SSERAFIM is not only capturing Korea, but also Japan.Acco... [more]
data.text:
LE SSERAFIM is not only capturing Korea, but also Japan.

According to the Recording Industry Association of Japan, LE SSERFAIM has obtained a "Gold" certification with its third mini album "EASY." It has sold more than 100,000 albums as of February.

Recording Industry Association of Japan certifies "Double Platinum" (more than 500,000), "Platinum" (more than 250,000), and "Gold" (more than 100,000) every month depending on the cumulative sales of singles and albums.

It is the second time that LE SSERAFIM has been certified as "Gold" by an album released in Korea after "UNFORGIVEN." They proved their unrivaled popularity in Japan once again.

"EASY" dominated the weekly album and weekly combined album categories in Japan's Oricon ranking (March 4th) as well. The team set its own record of highest sales and new points.

Less than two years after their debut, LE SSERAFIM became the "one-top" girl group in Japan. They became the first K-pop girl group to breaking the best record in the shortest time in Japan.

It is also popular in the U.S. "EASY" ranked eighth on Billboard's latest main album chart (March 9th). The title track entered the main song chart at 99th.

Meanwhile, LE SSERAFIM will participate in the Coachella Valley Music and Arts Festival, the largest music festival in the United States, on the 13th and 20th of next month.

<Photo=Source Music>

<Translated by=Jisu Kim (Dispatch)>
